articles.title: „Becker wird sich weiter mit seinem Insolvenzverwalter in London auseinandersetzen müssen“
articles.image_title: FILE - Former tennis player Boris Becker arrives at Southwark Crown Court in London, Friday, April 29, 2022. It has been reported on Friday, Dec. 9, 2022 that Becker is set to be released from HMP Huntercombe prison next week, after after serving just eight months of his two-and-a-half year sentence. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein, File)
